case.state: Well then... don't worry, ladies; I'll try not to stare too much.
More guys than I was expecting... guess that'll add to the risk.
So, this is where it's happenin'? Been a while since I had a good card game...
They serve Scotty Bolger's here? Thinkin' I might need it.
All right... time to kick this game into overdrive!
Heh, unlucky for y'all... m'dad taught me poker back in my farmboy days.
Played this plenty of times before... 'course, never done the strip variety.
Heard this joint's the most swingin' kinda place outside the Koprulu sector. I'm ready to see if it lives up.
I'll stick by my guns... though ~cards~ different couldn't hurt.
Take ~cards~ down, pass it 'round.
Alright, pretty good... ~cards~ could be better, though.
Two for two.
Three - one for each finger Sgt. Bronson still has.
Oof. I'll take four new ones.
Gotta play smart... four.
Yeah, this could be better. I'll change four 'a these.
These four gotta go.
No good... take the lot.
Alright, maybe a new hand'll be kinder.
Change of strategy... and cards.
Hell, just about anything would be better.
I'm takin' a second chance.
Just an odd ~cards.ifPlural(few|one)~ out... still good. For the most part.
~cards~'ll do fine, thanks.
Dealer, gimmie ~cards~ here.
Yeah, I'll be needin' ~cards~.
Mind passin' ~cards~ over?
Swappin' ~cards~.
Hm... ~cards~.
Odds could be better... gimme ~cards~.
Changin' ~cards~.
You got ~cards~ for me, dealer?
~cards~ seems good.
Well, this one... I guess I'll take ~cards~.
Exchangin' for ~cards~.
Go ahead, dealer.
Actually... I think I'm good here.
Never one for risks, but... I'll keep it.
Hope I'm not makin' a mistake here...
And the game rolls on...
Don't wanna be rude, but... you're done for.
Finally, some cards I can put my faith in.
Heh, knew my luck would turn around eventually. Well... hoped, anyway.
Well, ain't that pretty.
Oh yeahhhh...
It's in the bag!
I don't say this often, but I've got a good feeling about this.
Alright, this should be good.
I'd say this counts for a lot.
Sure wish I had these last week at the Hyperion's bar...
Heh, Tychus would be droolin' if he saw these...
Haven't seen numbers this pretty since Bull Company's kill count at Char.
Two words you can put in your pipe and smoke: kick ass!
I think I can count on these.
Yeah, I can deal with this.
Yeah, sure.
Wouldn't kill for 'em, but they're fine cards.
Hell, I've had worse odds.
Wouldn't be the riskiest gamble I've taken.
Grease the wheels a bit more, and it'd be fine.
Alright. Just alright.
Hmm...
Hey, even a rusty Vulture can save the day in the right situation.
All right... just don't hose me over, now.
Well, I'm not out just yet...
Got my trust in these cards... just hope it ain't misplaced.
If you're usin' your godly magic to screw me over, ~deitytarget~... well, I'll be real disappointed in you.
Well, it's what I drew. Just gotta deal with it.
'Least no credits are on the line.
Not likin' the look of this...
Man, it's times like this I'm glad I don't have that whole Protoss "Khala" thing goin' on in my head...
If you're tryin' to cheat me, dealer, you should know I used to be a Marshal.
Another thing to add to my list of regrets...
Never was a lucky man...
Maybe I should've asked Matt for advice...
This feels like seein' all my SCVs are blasted apart. 'Cept I can't blast anything back.
This is remindin' me of one of me and Tychus' old heists... one of the bad ones.
Yeah, this is goin' bust...
Jesus... guess you weren't kiddin' about the zombie thing after all.
(Hm... 'least it looks like Sakura's holding up pretty well, even with the... zombie thing.)
This'll probably sound like the strangest thing I'll say this whole game, but... you ain't missin' out on much, Miss Galatea.
It tastes good, and I'm not the worst drinker there ever was. That's what I keep tellin' myself, anyway.
If you're askin' if anyone here's a telepath, Megumin... well, I'd think this joint would have rules against those tricks.
Hm... how much do those golems go for? The Dominion could probably use several of 'em as of late.
"Mobile fortress", huh? Sounds kinda similar to the Zerg Leviathan my boys took down at Char.
Hm... don't really have an answer for that one, Miko. No use in frettin' over what you can't have, anyway.
("Conk"... shouldn'ta said that. Sounds too much like "cock". Now everyone's gonna think I hit my cock on the doorway.)
Fightin' anything nasty where you're from, ~militarytarget~ ? Hopefully nothin' capable of glassing whole planets...
So, ~militarytarget~ , what kinda hardware you got? Anything capable of outclassin' a battlecruiser?
Koprulu ain't one of the places you watch over or somethin', is it, ~deitytarget~? Kinda hopin' the answer's no...
Anything you wanna talk about, ~gloomytarget~? You look like something's eatin' away at ya.
You doin' okay, ~gloomytarget~? I can buy you a drink, if you want.
So, what's your outfit like, ~militarytarget~? I sure hope it's at least better than the Confederacy corps was.
Got any good war stories? This place is like a hodgepodge of everything outside Koprulu, so there's gotta be juicy stuff.
The place you came from turned out pretty differently than the place I'm from, didn't it, ~futuretarget~ ? Sure hope it's not for the worse...
You people got any good neighbors, ~futuretarget~ ? The Protoss where I come from are a bit odd, but they're actually pretty cool once you know 'em.
It's nice havin' you around, ~cheerfultarget~. Hell, I think you and Swann would get along famously.
Gotta say, ~cheerfultarget~, I like your attitude. Kinda wish I had it in recent times...
There's gods in this joint too? Don't suppose any 'a you hung with the Xel'Naga?
You're one of those sword-and-sorcery types, ~fantasytarget~? This place wouldn't happen to be in the Nexus, would it?
Heh, no matter how many times I see you fantasy folk, ~fantasytarget~, it'll always feel weird as hell.
We sure ~insanetarget~ should be here? ~insanetarget.ifMale(He's|She's)~ actin' like ~insanetarget.ifMale(he|she)~ just inhaled a whole silo of Terrazine before coming here...
Hey, mind playin' some Liberty Rock in here? Much obliged.
None of you are from Koprulu, are ya? It's never a dull place, I can say that much.
Hey, barkeep! How we doin' on that Scotty Bolger's no. 8?
This joint's cards are way nicer than what we've got on the Hyperion. Must'a had those for years...
Mind switching to the next song? I'm in the mood for some Johnny Cash.
Y'know, Koprulu ain't all bad. I'd love to show you all Vardona or Tyrador IX sometime.

condition.saying: Nice to see another vigilante!

case.state: Heh... that's certainly nicer than what Mengsk's usual word choices were.

condition.saying: It's hard to admit, but magic can't solve every problem. It's good to see you're so versed in technology, ~name~... but if you really want to enjoy stuff, magic is the way to go!

case.state: Don't have to tell me twice. I've seen people do all sorts of amazin' stuff with psionics... 'course, I'm less of a fan when my boys are on the recievin' end.

condition.saying: ~Name~! I won't let you lose morale! Whatever I can do to keep you inspired and upbeat, I'll do it, you just tell me, and I'll hope nothing goes wrong!

case.state: Heh... did I tell you that you remind me a lot of Matt, Akko?

condition.saying: ~Name~! All your stuff looks hi-tech! Do you know about magic, though? A lot of witches are old-fashioned, but an old professor of mine mixed the two together.

case.state: Sounds like how we outfit our Ghosts - givin' them equipment that kinda enhances their psionics and makes them a helluva lot deadlier.

condition.saying: You're so nice, ~Name~, can I do something nice for you? Like... make your clothes look cuter? Give you a little float spell?

case.state: Heh, well, if you insist, kid... any chance you can conjure up a plate of grilled Zergling thighs?

condition.saying: You look a little long in the tooth, Cowboy. There's not a lotta older guys where I work, if you get what I mean.

case.state: Not everyone's cut out for the whole fightin' and killin' business, after all. Unfortunately, it's often not too long before they find out the hard way.

condition.saying: There's a rare sight--a guy who's not fresh off his mom's tit. Rare for me, anyway--if a guy's past his twenties where I work, you know he's for real.

case.state: You sound pretty seasoned yourself, partner. You work as a mercenary in this sector?

condition.saying: ...You're a fellow space traveler? I suppose it's nice to meet a man in a non-hostile situation.

case.state: Tell me about it. These days, if I meet someone who ain't already out for my blood, it's a right relief.

condition.saying: I'm glad someone else here has experience in space travel, even if it's a man. Our crew's previous encounters with them have quickly devolved into conflict.

case.state: You're part of some kinda all-female crew? Didn't know some sectors even had those.

condition.saying: Oh, what's this? You're a more rugged man than I'm used to--and I hear you're a space traveler, too? It's a shame you're a little old for me.

case.state: Traveler's certainly one way of puttin' it. Feels like I've been everywhere in Koprulu by this point.

condition.saying: What a pleasant surprise to meet another spacefarer, and a man at that. Say, you wouldn't happen to have any young, handsome companions, would you?

case.state: Hmm... come to think of it, I think you might take quite a likin' to Matt, Miss Jura. Best man I know.

condition.saying: Why is it that every rogue spacefaring man we meet is old and grizzled? I'm too much of a gorgeous, delicate young thing for you.

case.state: Heh, you're certertainly not one to mince words, are you, Miss Jura? Not that you're wrong, of course.

condition.saying: Why, hello there, big boy. What's your name?

case.state: Name's Jim Raynor. Sorry if I'm late on introductions, it's just kinda nice to be somewhere relaxing for a change.

condition.saying: Tough guy, huh? All those muscles aren't gonna help you here. You need brains, and a lot of luck.

case.state: Well, sure hope it doesn't come down to that. Never was much with the former, and the latter's slipped me by these past few years.

condition.saying: Why all the weaponry? You're not a bounty hunter by any chance, right?

case.state: Heh, no way. The kinda price that was on my head, I'd be shot dead the instant I walked into a bounty joint.

condition.saying: Your face... so world weathered...

case.state: Well, when you've seen and been through a lot, it tends to leave a mark on you... in more ways than one.

condition.saying: It feels strange... how relatively good-natured you come off. It's not a bad thing by any means, just-- surprising.

case.state: Well, thank ya. I just figure there ought to be more good will in the world to balance out all the nastiness.

condition.saying: Ah yes... you. The world-weathered man. Jim, was it?

case.state: Yep. What's on your mind, Miss Galatea?

condition.saying: Wow, I didn't expect a man of my age to show up in a game like this. So, what brings you here, Jim? Winding down from a long, exhausting day at work?

case.state: You could say that, yeah - Matt's worried I haven't been takin' enough time for myself lately, so I decided to swing by here.

condition.saying: It's not everyday I meet a man my age in a strip poker game. I wonder if you came here for the same reason I did, Jim. That would be very convenient for both of us.

case.state: Heh, well, I think just about everyone comes to a strip poker game for the same thing, don't they?

condition.saying: I'm so used to seeing younger men here that I almost doubted that older men were allowed to play this game. I bet we came here for the same thing, Jim.

case.state: Sure are a lot of young folk 'round this joint, aren't there? Kinda wonder if we're the oldest ones here... 'course, you've certainly aged better.

condition.saying: I bet you've experienced a lot of things, Jim. Can you tell me some of those, dear? I'm dying to know what you do for a living.

case.state: Well, you'll sure get no shortage of stories from me, Jess. You see a lot when you tussle with the nastier parts of Koprulu... for better and for worse.

condition.saying: Surely, you have a lot of stories to tell to me, Jim. You look like you have a very interesting job, and I'd appreciate it if you can tell me about it.

case.state: Well, leadin' a revolution's less of a job and more like a full-time volunteer position... one that you can't quit, but you're always in danger of losin'.

condition.saying: So, when you found out you'd be playing strip poker, did you choose to stock up on every ammo holder you could find?

case.state: Nah, just wear 'em most of the time anyway. Can't act like it ain't helpin' me out right now, though.

condition.saying: You're a big guy, huh?

case.state: Guess so. Hopin' that's not a bad thing?

condition.saying: So, you're a pretty professional soldier, huh? What kind of guns do you use--

case.state: Well, most often I use a good ol' C-14 like most of my boys, but I've also got a fondness for my HEV rifle when trouble gets big.

condition.saying: Jim, what kind of person did you want to meet here tonight, anyway?

case.state: Hey now, who says I'm lookin' for someone tonight?

condition.saying: Jim...what is the Koprulu Sector? It sounds like a kracken's wet dream...

case.state: Well, Koprulu's one of the furthest parts of the Milky Way out there; and one of the nastiest, to boot. Bein' honest, a kracken would be one of the less worryin' things there.

condition.saying: The uh...Koprulu...whatever? What is it? Sounds like a sea monster haven or something.

case.state: Sure ain't far from the truth, kid. Though between the Zerg and sea monsters, I'll take the latter any day of the damn week.

condition.saying: Could you explain what a Koprulu is? I'm guessing it's a Pokémon but I'm probably wrong...

case.state: Your guess' about as good as mine, really. I've heard it apparently means "bridged" in some old Earth language, but I sure ain't no expert.

condition.saying: Could you tell us what your tattoos are all about? They look interesting.

case.state: Well, some I just got 'cause I thought they looked cool, but others are kinda marks of past victories. Some of my best soldiers have the same ones.

condition.saying: What's the story behind your tattoos, Jim? Got any shanties to share?

case.state: Heh, 'fraid I don't have any shanties; that's what I keep a jukebox for. Most of 'em do have a story, though.

condition.saying: Those tats look cool, Jim. What'd you get 'em for?

case.state: Well, some were just for fun, but others are mementos of past missions - you can actually find some of these on a few of my boys as well.

condition.saying: Is that you, John Wayne? Is this me?

case.state: ...Who said that?

condition.saying: Sir Raynor, I can tell you to be a rebellious man. But I also sense you have a strong sense of justice rooted in your soul. Well met.

case.state: Well, can't remember the last time someone gave me such a fancy greeting. Pleased to meet you here too, pal.

condition.saying: Sir Raynor, I hardly need to use my abilities to tell you’ve been entangled in some battles. Who, pray tell, is your adversary?

case.state: Yeah... that'd be Mengsk. Probably the most twisted and corrupt scumbag to ever live in Koprulu. He's killed millions just for himself, and fooled their families into thinking he's their savior.
Heh, there's always somethin' special about meetin' a fellow biker. Wasn't sure if I'd even find any in this joint.
Heh, there's always somethin' special about meetin' a fellow biker. Wasn't sure if I'd even find any in this joint.

condition.saying: So what’re you n’ your buddies all about? Ya got your own motorbike club or somethin’?

case.state: Heh, 'fraid not. I mean, people do know about the big, bad Vulture bikers in Raynor's Raiders, but they're hardly the main army.
Heh, this place doesn't get folks like me often, does it? Nearly hit my conk on the doorway comin' in here.
Heh, well, a fighter and a leader should stay in shape, and that goes double for anyone in Koprulu.

condition.saying: Hm... Did you go to a training school or something like that? Luna Nova's great for training witches, but I bet there's all kinds of other powers out there, huh?

case.state: If you're talkin' about the Confederacy Corps academy, then yeah. Don't recommend it to anyone, though. Not that it's still around.

condition.saying: It's easy to tell a hero when you see one. I've fought a few monsters, but most of them were actually pretty nice, y'know? They just need a union!

case.state: Kinda reminds me of the Protoss. Lots 'a folks find them pretty unnerving, but if you get on their good side, they're some of the best allies you can have.

condition.saying: ~Name~'s really nice! It's great that-- wait, you uh, don' tknow about... the whole world of secret magic and monsters, do you?

case.state: Well, I've been told that I know more about the Protoss than anyone else. That count for somethin'?

condition.saying: ~Name~'s hair looks kinda like Professor Ursula's! I'm hoping you'll be as inspiring!

case.state: Heh, well, you don't get to lead a revolution with just black hair and some harsh words, Miss Kagari.
Well, it was bound to happen eventually. Might as well be now.
Honestly, it's almost a relief by this point. Suspense was startin' to kill me.
Hey, it's all about luck, after all. Guess mine just ran out for now.
Don't count me out just yet - this thing's just getting started.
Heh, savor it, kids, 'cause this is the last time it's gonna happen tonight.
All right, all right - I'll do it, don'tcha worry now.
Well, you should never get too big for your britches, after all.
I've had plenty of time to learn to never get used to bein' on top... for better and worse.
Don't start thinkin' you've shattered my morale now; I'm still fightin' like a pissed-off Hydralisk.
Damn... well, easy come, easy go.
Can't win 'em all, I guess.
Dammit... feels like I just charged in only to face a line of Photon Cannons.
Oh boy... I knew what I was gettin' into, but that won't make this any less awkward.
Hm... startin' to wish credits really were on the line.
Usually I've got a special card to play... but not this time.
I swear, hands like this sting worse than a faceful of Baneling acid.
Just so we're clear, nobody swapped mine, right? Been cheated before, plenty of times.
Well then... I expect the fat lady to start singin' any moment.
Aw, hell...
Yyyyyeah... this is goin' bust real bad.
I'm not the type to beg for mercy, but... if ya have any to give...?
Alright, alright - I'm a big boy, I can take my licks.
Dammit, dealer, you're really puttin' me six feet under here!
Hell with it... if I've fallen this far, I might as well go a bit further.
All of a sudden, I don't feel like I've had enough to drink.
I'm not sure I like what the hell's going on here...
You sure we can't bring folding into this ruleset?
Dammit, it's already embarassing enough to get the short end in regular Poker.
I've had bad luck in cards before... but it never felt quite as uncomfortable as it does here.
Alright... not the best first sign.
You said it. It's only just hittin' me how long it's been since I was last somewhere that wasn't some battlefield or the Hyperion.
About as far away as I could've ever hoped for, pretty much. I don't think I've even been outside Koprulu before... besides the Nexus, that is.
Hell, where do I even start? The Zerg, the Tal'Darim, nearly every pirate and bounty hunter that ever held a gun... and of course the ol' Dominion. Pick your poison.
"Homeworld"? You mean to tell me that there's a whole Terran planet that only has women?
Well, I certainly don't think he would... but Mira probably would, unfortunately.
Don't get too discouraged, now. If you're really wantin' a kid, I'm sure there's plenty of donor banks in your sector, right?
Hm... beats the hell outta me. Most often I feel like the same farmboy outta his depth that I was 15 years ago.
Florence, eh? Well, it's quite a pleasure to meet ya.
It ain't always nice, but it usually doesn't end another way. Some kid with a gun thinkin' he's invincible may be stupid, but he's also dangerous.
Well, partner, if you're ever interested in some work outside of Earth, I'm sure Graven would have some nice, high-payin' jobs for ya.

condition.saying: I look quite young for my age, don't I? I don't look a day over 25, but I have the horniness of a 15 year old.

case.state: Sounds like you sure know how to have a fun night, Jess. You come to a lot of games like this?
Heh, you're definitely quite the looker, Jess. Kinda feel bad I didn't tidy up before comin' here.

condition.saying: If you think I already look young outside, wait 'till you see what I have under the hood. Quite unbelievable, I have to tell you.

case.state: Well then... guess I'll have to start playin' better if I want to see it, don't I?

condition.saying: So many have tried getting the prize, but so few have succeeded. The reward is all worth it, though.

case.state: High stakes, high reward... just what I'm used to anyway.

condition.saying: I suppose that true. But not everyone will get the prize by the end of the night. Only the winner would.

case.state: Not gonna make it easy, then? Guess that's fair. Easy ain't my thing neither.

condition.saying: Oh, I get what you mean. Lucky for you, I am quite the expert in helping men like you relieve their tension. I've been doing my part for more than two decades now.

case.state: Heh, well, you might have your work cut out for you, Jess. Feels like I've got a whole hive of tension in my head sometimes.

condition.saying: I can take care of your stress if you're interested. I have perfected the massage technique that would help ease your tension. I've only been doing it for the better part of two decades after all.

case.state: Damn, don't tempt me with somethin' too good to be true. Feels like half my muscles are held up just by stress alone sometimes.

condition.saying: But then what's all that stuff for?

case.state: Just feels better to have. You didn't bring all your trinkets there 'cause you're planning to use 'em, right?

condition.saying: It's not the same for me. Scars and wear don't affect me in the same way... being stone...

case.state: Stone? For real? Thought my eyes were trickin' me earlier...

condition.saying: I was having thoughts... What exactly is it you do? You don't seem much like the rest of these people.

case.state: Well... for the past several years, I lead a revolution of sorts against this kill-crazy tyrant - real megalomaniac who had near every Terran world in his grip.

condition.saying: I had a small hope that by this point you'd be taking of something of worth... Much of the challenge I supposed from you seems to be tedium.

case.state: Well, I may try to be courteous, but I ain't ever been one to go down without a fight.

condition.saying: Oh! I think it's a smart strategy... it's just not as cute as when girls do it.

case.state: Well, hopefully it won't be necessary anyhow - if I needed tons more to spare, I probably ain't that good at cards to begin with.
Heh, considering the girls decked out in gear I've seen, I can't help but agree, little miss.

condition.saying: I just think I prefer men a little softer. But you're still a cool shooter protagonist--

case.state: Huh... first time anyone's described me like that. But I won't tell you you're wrong or anything.

condition.saying: Appearances matter a lot, don't they? If you can make someone lose their morale before you start shooting, you already won, right?

case.state: Very sage, little miss - we didn't get that luxury often, bein' smaller than the Dominion Corps and all, but it was always nice when killin' could be avoided.

condition.saying: Oooooo-- don't be bashful now! C'mon! Spill!

case.state: Well... alright, maybe I did come here hopin' to see some pretty dame who could help me take my mind off things. With dreads, if I'm lucky.

condition.saying: Whoa! We don't usually see a ton of guys like you that play here, Jim!

case.state: Really? Didn't know if I'd stand out tonight... all the more reason for me to make a good impression, then.

condition.saying: So... that's a real gun, huh? I could talk a lot about magic but... what kind of gun are you using? Do you ever fight monsters?

case.state: Well, this here's a .42 wheelgun - a real antique kinda weapon. Don't use it much against the Zerg, though - I leave that to my C-14 more often.

condition.saying: Hm... do they make magic guns...? I bet someone does. I should ask a friend who works with magic items...

case.state: Now that could certainly be a boon. Hell, I'm surprised no one's tried combinin' Protoss psi-tech with our hardware before.
Well, sounds like an opportunity I can't ignore... I bet Swann would love to work with this friend of yours.

condition.saying: So... Jim, do you have tattoos everywhere...? Oh um, I mean... what are those tattoos on your arms for?

case.state: Reminders of past victories, mostly. The Battle of Dragon Ridge, Operation Snake's Blade, and other fun stuff like that.

condition.saying: Not that your socks aren't interesting and all, but what's that thing you're keeping in your sleeve? A good luck charm? Is that your magic?

case.state: 'Fraid it's nothing that interesting. Just a regular ol' pack of smokes.
...You certainly look like you've been waitin' for this part, Miss Kagari.
'Least with sea monsters, you can stay out of the water... 'Course, the Zerg can't swim, but them bein' in space is way worse.

Battle of Dragon Ridge, for instance - that was a raid on a Dominion mining operation carried out by some of my best Viking pilots. Real dicey situation, since so many workers there were practically slave labor.
Longest one I've had is the one on my back - got it years ago soon after my Confed squad's first real mission. It's how we got the name "Heaven's Devils".
One of 'em was Operation Snake's Blade - we were rescuin' a colony that the Dominion had just left to die when the Zerg started comin' for 'em. We dug in pretty good, but so did the Zerg.

condition.saying: You seem to be one of those “Salt of the Earth” types, Sir Raynor. Just the sort of subject a Crown Prince would do well to familiarize herself with.

case.state: You're certainly makin' a better first impression than the last prince I met. Though... ain't Prince a title for royal boys?

condition.saying: This Mengsk sounds like one of the vile warlords who ruled my country of Japan before the land was united under my Seventeen Article Constitution.

case.state: It's a universal truth, sadly - anywhere there's people, there's bad men among 'em. Good news is he got the ending he deserved; right now we're just tryin' to help his Dominion rebuild.

condition.saying: Ya look like the grizzled, veteran bikers we used to see ridin’ around. No offense. But you must have some dope stories!

case.state: Well, I ain't one to brag, but I'm willin' to bet not too many of those bikers had stories of patrollin' in warzones. 'Course, maybe that's why they're as old as they are.

condition.saying: Raynor’s Raiders? I’m guess by that there bandolier, you’re about more’n just “community service”.

case.state: Well, that depends on your definition. I'd say makin' the life of Arcturus Mengsk a livin' hell and rescuin' the folk he throws to the Zerg is servin' the community quite nicely.

condition.saying: You got some sick tats, Jimbo. Do any of ‘em got a story?

case.state: Good number of 'em do, Saki - though a few are just there 'cause I thought they looked good.
Same thing with our Spectres, though we also mix up some Terrazine gas into their minds... it's scarier than it sounds, trust me.
I'm hoping there's a good reason they didn't have you check your gun at the door.
Fine, just gimme a moment here.
Let's see... I guess I'll go with this now.
Bring me somethin' strong while I'm doing this, will ya?
Alright, these little guys are the first to go. Hope it'll be a while before they're joined by my other stuff.
Alright, now it really begins.
Fine by me. Don't need gloves to handle cards anyway.
Bein' frank, I'd be far more worried about losing these on the battlefield than just in some bar.
Guess I can lose this for a bit. This place is a far cry from the fringe world kinda bars anyhow.
If I couldn't stand to be away from my equipment, I'd probably have bigger problems than losing a card game anyway.
Never had to think tactically about clothing before... first time for everything, I guess.
Hm... guess I'll go with- no, wait...
Nobody swipe this while I'm not looking, capiche?
I've done a lot of weird shit in my day, and this is definitely one of the weridest.
Lost plenty of times to my boys before... but it sure as hell never involved this.
Yeah, yeah, yuk it up.
Well, I've lost dignity in worse ways... not by much, though.
I guess on the bright side, this ain't the worst time I've been caught with my pants down. Figuratively and definitely literally.
I knew I should've stayed in bed this morning...
Yeah, Sarah would loooooove this, I'm sure.
Maybe it's just my own bad luck. Each one I've run into always comes with a shiny set of CMC plating and a nasty heap of brainwashin'.
Heh, don't I wish. Running a minin' business would be a helluva lot less weight on my back than running a revolution.
Heh, maybe that's why Sarah always had an easier time clearin' them out. Well, besides the whole psionic stuff, anyway.
Mars? That's a planet somewhere in the old Earth system, right?
Heh, you'll have to keep beatin' me first, partner. And I don't feel like makin' it easy for ya.
Heh, who knows - my luck keeps goin' sour, I just might have to anyway.
That eager for me to lose again already, ~PA-15~?
The galaxy sure is a nasty place sometimes... Then again, maybe it'd be too borin' otherwise.
Huh... never thought a place like that could even exist. Then again, never had much experience with places outside Koprulu, neither.
To be fair, it's only a marriage in the very technical sense. Bit of a long story... pretty funny one, though.
Well, you oughta have quite the interesting resume by then. Not many pirates I can think of who turned to modeling.
What? Did everyone else just forget how to make a child naturally or somethin'? Seems like one of the last things people would forget to do.

condition.saying: You don't have any more tattoos? Not that I'm interested, I'm just curious.

case.state: Hey, even I've got a limit on the ink I'd like in me. You gotta stop somewhere.
Now that he's dead, we're more focused on helpin' his people rebuild and recover... though we've also had to dig in against these hybrid things tryin' to wipe everyone out.

condition.saying: I expect you'll make this a challenge if I have any hope towards winning.

case.state: Hm... well, I'd expect no less from you either, Miss Galatea. Stone or no stone.

condition.saying: We'll just see where these upcoming rounds take us then...

case.state: Right... lookin' forward to it.

condition.saying: Though... there's something so satisfying about button mashing the fire triggers, right?!

case.state: Heh, maybe when you're still new to your weapon... but experienced fighters only need a few good shots.
Heh, I'm sure anyone who's seen a mob of Zerg chargin' at 'em would agree, Futaba.

condition.saying: Oh! I guessssssss appearances can be pretty deceiving, can't they. You're a big softie, aren't you?

case.state: I hope we can still be compadres tonight, little miss, so speak up if I'm makin' you uncomfortable.

condition.saying: You're not one of those men who'd show up in a kilt and accidentally flash people, are you?

case.state: ...Well, now I ain't sure which mental image is worse - me flashin' people, or me in a kilt.

condition.saying: Well... lots of people cum and go here, so... I'm sure it'll work out for you, mwehehehe!

case.state: True... if not today, maybe next time. I'm thinkin' I quite like it here.

condition.saying: I can call you Jim, right? I mean, we're all very accomplished adults. Some of us have our own magic shows! We can be very professional about this.

case.state: Magic shows, huh? I'm guessin' yours are on a whole 'nother level than just the standard card tricks and hoop fare, Miss Kagari.

condition.saying: There's some really nasty creatures out there, but as long as you're not hurting fairies or spirits, then it's probably okay. They're definitely people you know?

case.state: Don't worry now, Miss Kagari. My boys and I have no quarrel with anything that ain't trying to blast down our doors.

condition.saying: Buuut! The problem with magic items is you can lose them. The only one I've never lost is my Shiny Rod! I guess I'd feel the way you do about your gun if I lost that, though...

case.state: Certainly looks like quite the special rod, Miss Kagari. I can only imagine how many scraps it's pulled you out of.

condition.saying: That's soooo cool! Maybe I'll try to do some transformations with tattoos, too!

case.state: Really now? You don't strike me as a tattoo type person... but hey, you could still surprise me.

condition.saying: I actually fought a dragon-- twice! The first time it kept eating all the magic in the area, the second one was embezzling from my school!

case.state: Heh, you've got a lot of gusto, Miss Kagari. I bet any dragons you find will think twice before tusslin' with you now.

condition.saying: Oh, really? Isn't smoking really bad for you...? I guess you could look super cool...

case.state: Well, I have been tryin' to kick it for a while, kid... but then again, there's a lot I've been tryin' to kick in my life.

condition.saying: So what if I am? We're professionals. I respect what you do, and how you look while you're doing it, and you do the same, and we'll keep this a fun performance, together!

case.state: Hm... alright, that sounds like a right good deal to me!
Those pilots really came through, though. The mining operation was destroyed, and the workers all went free. Probably the first freedom they'd had in a while.
Things weren't exactly peachy back then, but... well, I've still got some odd nostalgia for those days.
We snuck in some Ghosts that called in a few well-placed nukes, and the rest of the hive fell soon after. Don't think we lost a single civillian that day.

condition.saying: Sadly, in my era it wasn't expected a woman would be able to handle the affairs of a nation. But with a little Taoist magic here and there, I appeared as man before my loyal subjects.

case.state: Tch... people will believe whatever bull they wanna believe. I know I sure haven't seen much evidence suggestin' a man can always do a bang-up job ruling an empire.

condition.saying: If ever you need someone to advise you on administrating your Dominion, I would be more than happy to assist. Otherwise, I wish you the best.

case.state: Huh... well, I don't think the royal parliament's lookin' for any new cabinet members, but... s'ppose I could ask.

condition.saying: Heh. I ain’t had the chance to get old n’ grey ‘fore I… hadda retire from bikin’. Glad to see of us is still ridin’.

case.state: Life just got busier for ya, Saki? I know I kinda fell out of it for a while back when... actually, nevermind.

condition.saying: This Arcturus Mengsk guy must be your place’s version of the cops. Good luck stickin’ it to the man, brother.

case.state: Oh, he ain't just the cops - he's the army, the navy, the judge and jury... and one hell of a propagandist. But we'd rather face all that at once than fall into his dirty line.

condition.saying: I ain’t got any tattoos, but I do got some horribly disfiguring scars. There’s only one story there, n’ it’s “The End.”

case.state: Damn... end of your bikin' days like you said earlier, I assume.
Clearly, the cards have failed us... oh, sorry, I meant me.
I expect to see this back by the end of the night, got it?
Well, no use in cryin' about it. Time to turn things around.
Hey, I've still got an ace up my sleeve... ah, not literally, of course.
Don't count me out just yet - a bourbon cowboy always picks himself back up!
Sorry, boys and girls, you're gonna need to work if you want something bigger.
Probably should've removed the shells from that before I came here anyway.
Hopefully I won't be needin' any ammo in a bar like this anyway.
Hate to give this up... that ol' piece's been with me for years.
Better not lose this, dealer. Had it since my outlaw days.
If any of you are thinkin' about swipin' it, good luck finding the ammo it needs first.
These boots were made for walkin'... but I don't need 'em to walk all over you.
Bit of a shame. I like how sturdy those boots feel.
How's that song go, again? "I got boots, and socks, and I'm bringin' 'em home to you!"
Sure hoping it ain't been long since you last cleaned this floor, barkeep.
Well... I'm guessin' at least a few of you are enjoyin' the view.
'Least I'm not drunk this time... actually, I'm not sure if that makes it worse or better.
Come to think of it, maybe I oughta give that old thing a wash when this is done.
Hoo boy... I gotta pick things up, and fast!
C'mon, cards, don't fail me now!
Yeah, this is about as bad as it can get.
Well? Show us what you're workin' with.
Hey, I've seen Protoss with nothin' on 'em. I doubt this'll be worse, partner.
Just get it over with quickly - trust me, it'll be better that way.
I won't look too much... trust me, I won't.
C'mon, ~player~, let's see some enthusiasm.
Hey, don't get too down about it, kid - have some fun with it!
You've been lookin' good so far, partner - I doubt that'll change.
Heh, feelin' good about this, ~player~?
I'd be lyin' if I said I wasn't still curious myself...
You gonna stick to your word, ~player~?
Tough break, kid.
My condolences, ~player~.
How's that for a whoop-ass hand?
Like I always say, don't mess with Mar Sara!
I'd say I feel bad... but I don't wanna be insincere.
Still in the game, kid? I think you still got this.
Hey, you ain't in the loser's circle just yet.
Heh... 'least luck's riding better with you tonight.
C'mon, show something good for your competitors here...
You know, sparky, if you've ever got time, I wouldn't mind givin' you a tour of the Hyperion. Wanna show you what a real revolution flagship looks like.
Well, I've seen more of Tychus than I ever wanted to before. This won't phase me, ~name~.
Not exactly what I came for tonight... but I suppose it's only fair.
Gotta say, sparky, I like your spunk. You definitely need some if you don't want your revolution to die out.
Y'know, Sparky, you kinda remind me of myself back in my younger days. Hopefully without the screw-ups, though.
Sorry, ~name~, but it's time to man up.
I'm just glad I'm not playin' this with my usual poker company. No disrespect to 'em, but they ain't exactly pretty.
Hope you're not plannin' to just complain the whole time - get to it!
Just be glad you're not up against Matt. You'd be smoked by now.
Well, you're up, ~name~. Don't disappoint.
Haha, yeah, another one in the bag!
Guess that's another one for me! Time to pay the due, ~name~!
Should probably keep my eyes closed here...
Well, ain't this quite the pickle... uh, the one I'm in, so to speak.
J-Just do it..
Alright, let's make things real interestin'!
I'm not coming off too eager about this, am I?
Don't worry, girl, Sarah won't hear about this.
Sorry, ~player~, but it's too late to back out now.
Don't worry - unlike a lot of my boys, I can keep a secret.
Hoo... this is gettin' real in more ways than one!
Sorry, ~player~, but that's the way it bounces.
My condolences, ~player~.
Well... not gonna lie, I've been kinda interested in this.
We're all friends here, ~player~, I won't judge.
How's that for a whoop-ass hand?
Like I always say, don't mess with Mar Sara!
I'd say I feel bad... but I don't wanna be insincere.
Well... guess I'm still fortunate in one way.
Hey, you ain't out just yet, are you?
Dazzle us good, ~player~... and then make your comeback.
Mmm...
So... an academy for magic kids, huh? Sure hope it's better than the Confederacy or Dominion's Ghost academies.
So, you used to lead a biker gang, Saki? Bet you were known as quite the hellraiser.
Heh, with your kinda rep, Saki, I bet you'd be hell on wheels in the seat of a Vulture.
I'd ask if you're serious, lil' red, but given the usual lineup here... that ain't just a costume you're wearin', is it?
Quite the wizard's garb you're wearin'... you wouldn't happen to be from Azeroth, would you?
Hey, lil' red... you said your name was Megumin, right?
Well now, a popular singer showin' to a strip poker game? Certainly don't hear about that sorta thing often.
I wouldn't expect this to be your kinda scene, Miss Sakura. Any particular reason you came here?
Sure feels nice to chitchat about bikin' with someone again... well, other than Swann, but he's no fun.
Somethin' going on, Miss Sakura? You seem to be takin' this one harder than before.
Just so we're clear... you feelin' alright? Bein'... this ain't painful for you or anything?
So, Miss Jolyne - word on the street's that you've done a fair bit of fightin' the law?
Gettin' rid of your dress now? That's... too bad. Looked real good on ya.
You're... holdin' up pretty well for bein' a zombie, Saki. Gotta say I'm impressed.
Hm? You gonna take off somethin' real big now?
Quite the hairpiece you got there, Nep - you a gamin' enthusiast?
Gotta say, I'm more used to seein' those buttons on arcade cabinets than someone's hair.
Pretty nice ring there... someone special in your life?
Gotta say, cowgirl, I like your style. Good to see the ol' tradition's still alive.
Y'know, Tychus once tried to get Dr. Hansen to play this with him. Let's just say I'm currently where he only wished he was.
Well then... must be my lucky night.
Heh... guess I still am a pig, after all these years.
Well... I think my love for cards is about to go up.
I get they don't ask you to check your guns here, but... a whole rifle's a bit excessive, don't you think?
Hey, so - regardless of where this game goes, Miss Matoi...
Alright, I've gone long enough without askin': is there a reason your uniform did... that?
So, Miss Matoi, word on the street is you've been fighting some holier-than-thou tyrant yourself?
Oooh... sorry, hun'.
Alright, ~name~ - time to step to it, girl!
Your turn, hun'.
Matt would probably be warning me against continuing right now... but hell, I gotta see where this goes.
All right... maybe this wasn't such a bad idea after all.
If I, uh... sneak a peak... sorry.
All of a sudden, losing doesn't seem so bad.
Well... aren't I in the right place now.
A tie in Poker? If this ain't part of some Xel'Naga prophecy...
Well, whaddya know... kinda wish I hadn't knocked out so soon.
Startin' small, I see.
Alright, you're makin' us work for it, then. Fine by me.
Everyone's gotta start somewhere.
Well, that is a pretty snazzy ~clothing~.
Kind of a shame - ~clothing~ fit you nicely.
Not the daring type, ~name~?
Still playing close to your chest. So to speak.
Can't hold off the big guns forever, ~name~.
Hm... I think one of my firebats has something just like ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~.

state.text: Lucky you, still this far ahead.
Damn... how did you get such a lead on me, anyway?
Just don't tell any of my boys I lost this bad...

case.state: Don't expect that to save you for much longer, kid.
Don't try and put it back on when no one's looking, now.
Let's be a bit more risky next time, shall we?
Come on, ~name~, it's called "Strip Poker" for a reason.
Gotta destroy the bunker so you can get to the base, after all. Except a bunker can be impressive.
Hope you weren't plannin' to impress with that.
I'm still swingin' strong, now, so don't expect any lenience!
Stay frosty - bigger stuff's gonna be coming soon.
You just came here with that so you wouldn't have to take off something bigger, didn't you?
Hope you're not the gloatin' type.
Well, at least you're finally gettin' knocked down a few pegs...
Heh... weak...
That ain't nothin'...
Done already?
Looks pretty on you, if you don't mind me sayin'.
Didn't I see one of my Spectres with ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ exact ~clothing~ last week?
Hm... wonder how that would look on Sarah...
It's a start, at least.
At least we're taking this slow, it looks like.
Guess it'll be a while before things get interesting.
Not exactly the most excitin' choice.
Well, it's somethin'.
My parents always told me you'd have to work for the good stuff in life. Guess that's true even in the oddest of times.
If you lived in the Koprulu sector, that'd have probably been blasted apart years ago.
Forgot you had that, really.
Dammit... I really lagged behind here, didn't I?
Well, that's no fun.
Maybe if I squint...
Should've brought some of Tychus' old dirty mags...
Let's see some big plays next, huh?
Hey, don't touch that jukebox! Big Tuna's playin'!
How much exactly did ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ set you back, ~name~?
Keep it nice and clean for her, dealer, will ya?
Dang... you kinda do look different now.
Kinda gives you a new look.
Well, I reckon things will get a mite more interesting here.
Alright, back to the action!
Bring it in, dealer!
Next round, let's go!
Guess even the small stuff can make a difference.
Well, at least you're finally gettin' knocked down a few pegs...
Gotta keep my head in the game...
Odds look stacked against me, but I'm used to that.
Lemme just concentrate here...
Hoping you'll pick things up soon.
Tell ya what, ~name~ - I'll give you a pack of smokes if you go for something bigger instead.
All right, a step-up from last time...
Still dippin' your toes in the water, ~name~?
Well, it's better than the usual caliber so far...
Still kinda slow... but moving nonetheless.
We're gettin' there - we're definitely gettin' there.
Glad it's not my ~clothing~, at least.
Heh... you're the one to take off your ~clothing~, and yet I'm still feelin' shaky about this.
This game's definitely gotten quite up to speed.
Got plenty of room to catch up... I'm not down just yet.
Still way ahead of me, aren't ya...
If I was a lady, I'd be quivering about now.
Actually... maybe I should be glad you've still got your pants on.
Heh heh... sorry, I just started thinkin' of all the questions my Protoss friend Zeratul would have if he walked in on this.
Wonder if I remembered to lock up my Vulture...
Don't act so worried, now. You still got a lot on ya.
Not the most excitin' game just yet, unfortunately.
To be fair, you usually wear that anyway.
Sorry, kid - I don't impress easily.
Could we get some some Tom Petty in here? Country boy needs his tunes!
Well now... how's your strategy going to change without your ~clothing~, I wonder?
All right; let's give this game some pepper!
Let's kick it up a notch next time, ~name~.
Hope you're prepared to lose some more... I'm certainly prepared to make you lose.
Remember - no puttin' that back on until it's all said and done here, got it? That goes for everyone else, too.
You ain't tough for gettin' rid of that ~clothing~, ~name~. Just so you know.
Feelin' ballsy yet? Heh, lord knows I sure am...
You should hang that up somewhere.
Tell ya what, ~name~ - I'll give you a pack of smokes if you go for something bigger instead.
Don't fret now, ~name~, you got plenty more.
You'll still be covered up pretty well. For better and worse.
Hey, would someone mind turnin' down the volume? I wanna hear my new friends better.
Well... things are progressing quite steadily.
Not the worst thing to ditch, ~name~ - hell, some folk might've even brought it just as extra protection here specifically.
Don't fret now, the dealer'll hand it back when this is done.
Nice ~clothing~... sorry, wrong time?
If this were in Koprulu, at least two of you would've reached for your guns by now. Actually, you'd probably be one of 'em, ~name~.
I'm all for bendin' the rules, but not this time. Hand over the ~clothing~, ~name~.
C'mon, get on my level already, ~name~.
Y'know, if you wanna play it up a bit...
C'mon, help a cowboy out.
Hey, you're still quite the looker without your ~clothing~.
I think the dealer's trustworthy... they better be, anyway.
Be glad Tychus ain't here, ~name~ - he'd keep moanin' for you to ditch something bigger.
So... random question about your ~clothing~, but does it come in Infested Terran size?
Get ready to do it again real soon, ~name~.
Still a ways to go, but we're gettin' there.
I see it'll still be a bit before this game gets all spicy.
Things oughta pick up sooner or later. Hope it won't be because of me, though.
Alright, lady luck - don't fail me now.
Deal me in - I wanna make this next hand count.
Slow and steady wins... always sounded like horseshit to me.
Yeah, that ain't bad...
Heh, you've got my attention.
I like where this is goin'.
So it's all come down to this...
Well then, this just got real. Sure beats me doin' it, though.
Heat's definitely pickin' up! Can't get out of the kitchen, though.
I was hopin' someone would remove their ~clothing~ eventually. And that someone wouldn't be me, too.
Is it just me, or did the music get quieter in here?
Mind not draggin' it out, ~name~? I'd appreciate it.
Hoo boy... things are gonna get awkward real soon.
Too late to be shy now...
I won... so why does it feel like I still lost?
Is looking mandatory?
Well, this is sure gonna feel strange...
Heh heh heh...
Jeez, and you still haven't bought me dinner yet?
A little late to the punch, aren't you?
Just startin' now, kid?
Well, bye-bye, ~clothing~.
I wonder if Mengsk ever played this- actually, no, I don't wanna think about that.
Hm... how long's it been since you last ironed your ~clothing~, ~name~?
Sure took a while, ~name~. Startin' to feel the pressure?
Come on, dealer, I'm ready to ride into victory!
No use in pumpin' the brakes now, ~name~. Let's keep it going!
I said I'd win, come Hell or high water... and you're certainly leanin' closer to the former right now, ~name~.
(Alright, I can do this. Long as I keep my head clear, ~name~'ll go down before I do.)
Aw hell, I'm getting flashbacks to Tychus' drunk streaking...
How's it feel bein' closer to my level now, ~name~?
Yeah, I definitely ain't telling Matt about this later.
If you're tryin' to seduce me, it's a bit too late.
Not bad. If you wanted a more physical compliment, though, I'm all tapped out.
Game's still spicy, then?
Well then... not bad.
...Yeah, I think I can look for a couple seconds.
Sorry, miss, but rules are rules. Not that I'm a stickler for them or anything.
Don't worry - I won't tell if you don't.
Not gonna lie, ~name~; I was kinda looking forward to this.
Must've spent a pretty penny on that ~clothing~, ~name~.
You gotta do what you gotta do.
Probably should've worn an extra if you were worried about it.
Too late to turn back now, ~name~.
Time to turn up the heat!
Well, then... you all prepared to start seein' more skin, boys and girls?
Was kinda wondering how you'd look without your ~clothing~, actually.
Hoo... sure glad Sarah can't read me right now.
(Startin' to wonder if this was how Matt got hitched with Mira...)
Whoo, did Blaze forget to seal the valves on his suit, or is it getting hot in here?
Come on... help out ol' Jimmy.
I won't look if you don't want me, but... well, if it's all good...
This going where I think it's going?
And now the grand reason most people choose to come here...
If you don't mind me sayin' - and I sure hope you don't, considering you're here and all... well, I think you're mighty fine.
If it makes you feel better, ~name~, I think you're quite pretty all around.
Congrats, ~name~: now your clothing weighs as much as the equipment of the average female Ghost in the Dominion.
Riiiiight on!
Your luck's runnin' out, ~name~.
Rock and roll!
Woo... harder knockout than a round from a Siege Tank.
If you don't want me to look, uh... is there any place I should look?
Gettin' real down to the wire, here...
(Actually, is anyone here a telepath? I might be in trouble if that's the case...)
Mmm...
Really likin' where this is goin'...
No better time to be doin' this than now...
Not a bad shirt, ~name~... shame you're gonna lose it.
Like Tychus would say; "Sun's out, guns out!"
Just do it - I've seen plenty of squadmates in the showers before.
Hey, you gotta own your body. Don't be shy!
Hell of a time to start losin' your shirt, hoss.
Just gonna be glad it wasn't me again...
No use in tellin' you to keep your shirt on, sparky... heh.
Well? Everyone's waitin'...
Right...
Hey, once you've seen Swann on a drunken bender, nothing's that shocking anymore.
Want me to buy you a drink? You look like you can put 'em away like the devil!
See? You got nothin' to be shy about!
Not bad. Bit more lifting each day, and you'd be right 'n fine.
Damn... we really could've used you when recruitment numbers were low.
With a body like that, I bet you could go toe-to-toe with one of them Tal'Darim warriors.
Don't let any Dominion recruiters catch you, now - they'll be on you like stink on a Roach.
Damn... you're lookin' pretty good, actually.
Well, aren't you quite the sight?
Alright. What's the next thing to go?
Let's keep this game rolling!
Heh, were you hopin' for this exact situation, ~name~?
Don't be shy - you'll still look good either way.
Hey, you are quite the handsome fella...
I'm sure you'll understand if I look away for sec.
I ain't gonna judge you, ~name~, so ease up a little.
Don't look so sheepish - you knew what you were gettin' into.
Look, let's just get on with this, okay?
I won't make any comments if you don't.
Well? I ain't waitin' forever.
...Sure, why not?
Alright, ~name~, let's see what you're working with here.
No need to be shy, ~name~ - lord knows I sure ain't right now.
You're a good-lookin' guy, ~name~... believe me.
It's not the size of the gun, after all... it's how well you use it.
Don't worry, ~name~ - only opinion that matters is the lucky gal you're spendin' your time with.
Hey, just remember that even a marine can take down a battlecruiser.
...Yeah, I'll be fine.
You're all good, man.
It's not that bad, now, is it?
One more, and that's that.
Feelin' the heat yet? Better not slip up, now.
Over and done with. Now let's not lag.
Not bad, not bad...
Guess that wasn't a grenade in your pants...
Jesus... could you make it a bit easier to not stare, please?
Well, aren't you blessed?
Bet you've got quite the happy partner, ~name~...
Damn... was it that big before?
Heh, you eager to join me in the loser's ring already?
Woah! Almost thought you'd snuck in a Zerg larva for a sec!
You know what they say about pride and how it goeth before the fall, right?
You know, I'd almost think you were lookin' forward to this part.
Well, this is quite the pickle you've got- shit, I mean I'm in.
And the Nexus lies bare...
Wasn't plannin' on this, were ya?
Well, look who's proud of himself.
Sorry if I sound eager, ~name~, but this'll be the first human pair I've seen in a long time.
Don't see why a bot would need a chest like that... but hey, who's complainin'?
Guess we know where your builder's mind was goin' when they made this part of you, ~name~.
Too late to be reluctant now, isn't it?
Wouldn't be shocked if some of our new friends here were thinkin' about this moment all game.
You've still got a chance, ~name~. Don't lose hope just yet.
Well... yeehaw, then!
Show us somethin' good, will ya?
This should be good...
If you ask me, ~name~, any guy would be lucky to have you.
Just remember: large breasts may fill a man's hands, but small breasts... will fill a man's heart.
Niiiiiice...
This is gettin' good...
Now there's a couple of Spider Mines I wouldn't mind steppin' into...
Clock's ticking down for you, compadre. Think you can still turn it around?
...Reaaaaally hopin' you're not secretly a telepath here, ~name~.
Well, guess it's my lucky day after all.
Young and beautiful... you know, you really are quite blessed.
Thanks for makin' this a bit better, hun'.
Good for you... and me, too.
Damn, I don't think the Dominion Ghost Program has any suits that would fit you.
You're not dealing with any back pains, are you, ~name~?
Suddenly I'm rememberin' several of those Azeroth ladies back in the Nexus...
Holy hot damn!
Couple 'a Carriers, loaded with fun...
Sure puts a smile on this old cowboy's face...
Heh, way nicer than our adjutant units.
Woah... guess robotics came one hell of a long way where you're from, ~name~.
Sure beats the holo-stripper in the Hyperion's bar.
Rock and roll!
Outstanding!
Damn, now that's a pretty sight.
Well, that definitely helps.
Y'know, this might be kinda nice if it wasn't for everyone else here.
When you finally take on this Satsuki... give her a good hit for ol' Jimmy, will ya?
You know, I think I'm really warmin' up to this game.
I'd be lyin' if I said curiosity hadn't struck me by this point, ~name~.
I can look away for a moment if you need.
C'mon, ~name~, don't leave us hangin'.
Hope you're ready, ~name~, 'cause I don't think the others are gonna wait.
C'mon, ~name~, don't leave us hangin'.
I'm done here, but you can still impress me.
Hey, if I could do what I just did, you can definitely do this.
Well... 'least I won't be alone on this no more.
Sorry. I'm tryin' not to chuckle about this situation.
Well? You got the goods, right?
Wonder if Sarah might be up for joinin' sometime...
Game's not over yet, ~name~. Give us some pepper!
However this game ends, ~name~, consider all drinks on me.
Sorry, kid, but I've come too far to go easier on you now.
Hey, don't worry. It'll still be special when you meet that right someone.
Hoo... situation feels tigther than Swann in an SCV.
So... it's you or me, then.
Won't be surprised if Tosh can sense everything I saw here later...
Woah... were you gettin' excited about this part, hun'?
If it gets too much, just take a deep breath. It's all good.
Damn... looks soft...
P-Pretty...
Ahhhh...
They still got plenty of farms back on Earth, ~name~? Can't imagine that old tradition ever goin' away.
So, "Phantom Thieves", huh? You like a group of desparados or something?
Gotta say, didn't expect to find other revolutionaries in this joint. Feels like meetin' kindred spirits.
Can't help but wish we knew about your lot sooner, ~Name~. With your help, we might've taken down Mengsk in a matter of days.
Heh, well, my mates from the Confederacy days sure had a likin' for gangs like yours - probably would've started one of their own if not for the Guild Wars.
Wait, what in the-?!
Don't wanna pry too much, it's just- Jesus!
Strange, but... it looks just like the one Sarah wore, all those years ago...
The Vulture's a real beaut, trust me - ain't nothin' quite like the roar of the hover engines, ridin' off into the night.
Nah, he just ain't too keen on the Vulture specs. Ask me, he just can't appreciate the classics.
Makeup? You don't look like you got any-
Wait, what in the-?!
'Course, they wouldn't have been as young as you... but hey, if you got the grit, you got the grit.
...Well... definitely wasn't expectin' this tonight.
Huh... guess I can take your word if you're still fine after losin' your head.
Damn straight - it ain't always the hardware you got, but the rider in it.
What in blazes-?!
Well... that just happened.
Anyone know if the jukebox here has Elite Tauren Chieften?
Wonder if the Protoss ever... actually, how do they fornicate to begin with?
Hm-hm-hm... 'scuse me for scribblin', I can barely write my name...
So... ever listened to Blues Saraceno? Pretty underrated, if you ask me.
Damn, sounds like you're really gettin' into it.
(If I took a drink now, and they saw me spill some on my chest... hmm...)
Hey, barkeep! My friends and I need to wet our whistles here!
Aaaand now the other part of this game comes in...
Let's just get this over with.
How often have you played poker before, ~name~?
Another one bites it!
Finally down for the count, ~name~!
Like I said, a country boy can survive!
Oooookay then...
Aw jeez...
So, you're down for the count too, huh, ~name~?
Welcome to the losers circle, man. Let's make it a party.
Anytime you're ready, ~name~.
Heh, if Valerian knew what I was doin' right now...
Just don't get too loud, now.
Shit, this is like the time I walked in on Stetmann doin' it...
Yeah, already this feels awkward.
Hey, man, you do you.
Well, hopefully this starts feelin' fun again for you.
Guess it's a circlejerk, now...
Goin' for first, or last?
Looks like I've got the head start...
Christ, never thought I'd see myself in this situation...
I oughta give that a try myself later...
Damn, feels like it's been years since I last visited ol' Rosie Palms, myself.
Well, at least you're enjoying yourself, ~name~.
I remember occassionally hearing my old Confed squadmates making those same noises at night.
I'm all for 'hard and fast', but you might wanna slow down there, ~name~.
You close yet?
(Am I supposed to just twiddle my thumbs or something?)
Maybe you should've brought a magazine or something.
So... I tell you yet about the time one of my Viking pilots took down a whole Spire full of Brood Lords?
Heh, happy to see me, ~name~?
Look all you want, kid - you've earned it.
Are you lookin' at me? Heh, wasn't expecting this... but I'm still flattered.
Gotta say, man, you are quite the looker.
Heh... not a bad technique.
You gotta... savor the moment.
...You ain't lookin' at me, are ya? I mean, I'm cool if you are...
Heh, quite the mess we're in, isn't it?
Hey, no rush. We're in the same boat, after all.
Hope that was wasn't too awkward for you.
Damn, how long were you holding that in?
And with that, another one's officially down for the count.
Christ, I think that was audible...
Guess I'll be there before too long...
Heh, good for you.
Well then, that's all she wrote.
Like I always say; don't mess with Mar Sara!
Looks like I'm your huckleberry, hun'.
Well, yippie-ki-yay!
Hey, it ain't so bad, ~name~. Just get in your own little mental space.
Trust me, it sounds a lot worse than it feels.
Just do whatever you need to get comfy, kid.
Helluva time to start, ~name~.
Welcome to the losers circle, hun'. Kept your spot warm for ya.
I'm already enjoyin' this, but... this is certainly an improvement.
Well, nothin' to do but start shuffling, dealer.
I'd ask if this feels weird, but I think this stopped being weird a long time ago.
Like I said, we're all friends here... friends who just so happen to be fiddlin' with their rifles next to each other.
Need a hand with that? Sorry, bad joke.
Hey, good on you for stickin' to the rules. You're a good opponent.
Sorry, hun', but I'm already thinkin' of someone else.
I won't get any near you if you don't get any near me.
Heh... I must be the luckiest man in Koprulu.
Damn... your lover's gonna be quite the lucky one someday.
Heh, how is someone like you still single?
Your partner's definitely lucky to have you, ~name~.
Just think of your special someone, ~name~. It's what I'm doin'.
It's... actually kinda mesmerizing.
I feel kinda dirty seein' this, but I can't look away...
I overheard one of my Banshee pilots talking about doing something similar to that once... though I didn't listen long.
Can't lie, this is starting to feel excitin'.
So, uh... anything we can do to help, ~name~?
Heh, this is definitely the liveliest game of Poker I've ever been part of.
Actually, I think Sarah's moaned a couple times like that...
Hell, ~name~, you look like you're practically halfway to Heaven right now.
Quite the display you're putting on, ~name~... almost looks like you're enjoyin' being watched.
Hmm... your moans are... actually quite pretty...
You've actually made things a bit less awkward, so... thanks.
Ahh, that's the stuff...
R-Right on...
Wouldn't mind goin' solo myself right now.
Now that's an explosion that'd make a Thor pilot proud!
Hope that was as enjoyable for you as it was for the rest of us.
Damn, I think half of the whole sector heard you there, ~name~.
Sure hope the janitor here uses a good stain remover...
Thanks for waitin' on me, hun'.
Hoo boy, that did me good...
Heh, hope mine is as good as yours...
...Yeah, that's how my luck usually goes.
Probably should've seen this coming, really.
...My mistake. This is as bad as it gets.
Jeez, if Tychus were here, he'd never let me hear the end of this.
Well, my game's done with. Nothin' left to do but rub it out.
All right, I know y'all have been wantin' a piece of ol' Jimmy. I won't disappoint.
Mind not starin' so much? Makes it kinda hard to get my Wraith off the ground, if you know what I mean.
Mm... that's right...
This is feelin' better than I thought it would...
Oh, Sarah...
Been too long since I did this...
Heh, this brings me back...
Hmm... hmm...
Aw yeah...
Heh, I could do this all day.
Wish there were more girls with dreads here, can't lie.
Oh, my head's swimming...
Actually, thinkin' about her Primal form kinda makes it better...
Oh yeah, I'm gettin' there...
Just a bit more...
Ah! S-SARAHHHHH!
Ahhh... damn, I gotta admit; that felt pretty good.
Well, don't mind me. I'm just gonna relax here for a bit.
Hm-hm-hm-hmmmm-hm... Born on the bayyyyyou...
Wouldn't mind comin' back here again soon. I'll still be in it to win it, though.
Just 'cause I'm done here don't mean you can't still impress me.
What kinda grub does this place have? Startin' to feel a bit peckish.
Well, boys and girls, it's been plenty fun!
Hell yeah - Raiders roll!
Heh... looks like I've still got it after all.
Bit close for comfort there... still, I had fun.
Next time, I won't slip up so much... if y'all are ever up for a next time, that is.
Alright, dealer, I like ya, but... gimmie back my damn clothes.
Congrats, ~name~ - you earned it.
C'mon, everyone, let's raise a glass to ~name~!
An honest victory for an honest game... I can live with that.
